alert.note: Alert for Goshen (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 3:55PM MDT until July 19 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Scotts Bluff County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southwestern Sioux County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... East central Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 354 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Veteran, or 13 miles southwest of Torrington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Torrington, Lyman, Yoder, Huntley, Stegall, Veteran and Henry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
